pageContext.claim: “Media Falsely Claimed Violent Riots Were Peaceful And That Tear Gas Was Used Against Rioters https://t.co/3crnij4pWT Fake News is hurting our Country so badly. Don't burn down churches. This article is a must read!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is wrong. A largely peaceful protest had formed outside the White House, which was broken up using forceful measures including gas in order for the president to take a photo in front of St. John's Episcopal Church,
